trans-unit.source: a string containing the text on the clipboard.

trans-unit.source: sets the @error to non-zero.

trans-unit.source: 1 = if clipboard is empty

seg-source.mrk: 1 = if clipboard is empty

target.mrk: 1 = if clipboard is empty

trans-unit.source: 2 = if contains a non-text entry.

seg-source.mrk: 2 = if contains a non-text entry.

target.mrk: 2 = if contains a non-text entry.

trans-unit.source: 3 or 4 = if cannot access the clipboard.

seg-source.mrk: 3 or 4 = if cannot access the clipboard.

target.mrk: 3 or 4 = if cannot access the clipboard.

trans-unit.source: When multiple selecting file/dir are stored in the clipboard, the filename/dirname are returned as texts separated by @LF.
